page_not_found.title: Page Not Found
page_not_found.description: Oops! Looks like this page has gone on a digital vacation. It's nowhere to be found in our cyber neighborhood.

web_not_supported.title: Unsupported Platform
web_not_supported.description: This feature is currently only supported on Windows and Android. The web browser version you're using is not supported.

error.title: Oops! Something went wrong
error.description: Sorry about that. We've hit a bump in the road.
error.report: If you keep seeing this error, please let us know on <0>GitHub</0>. We appreciate your help in improving our app.
